sentences.sContent: The risk and severity of sunburn depend on the body's natural skin colour.
sentences.sCn: 晒伤的风险和严重程度取决于身体的自然肤色。

words.tran: 晒黑的；有晒斑的；日炙的
晒黑（sunburn的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: If someone has sunburn, their skin is bright pink and sore because they have spent too much time in hot sunshine

trans.tranCn: 晒伤皮肤；晒红皮肤；晒黑皮肤
